recipesJson.name: Pantsless Krampus
recipesJson.author: SlashaLO
recipesJson.description: Working to make my own apple cinnamon tobacco. I'm using an apple trio that I find makes a GREAT red apple, all around. I went with dryer tobacco's to try to dry the wetness of the apples.

reviews.text: Man, that apple stone is amazing. Finally I have found a good starting point to mix a apple. DonÂ´t vape any tabaccos, but took the apple base, done some tweeks and created a solid apple receipe. Thanks!
